db:abstract.db:para: Adding context-sensitive help to Qt applications.

db:article.db:para: The Qt help system includes tools for generating and viewing Qt help files. In addition, it provides classes for accessing help contents programatically to be able to integrate online help into Qt applications.
The following example illustrates how to add context-sensitive help to applications.

db:listitem.db:para: Using the QHelpEngineCore class to implement context-sensitive help for applications.
